ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Just a warning.
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve canceled my subcription at least 4 times and never had this problem (currently not subscribed now). Did you call SOE to find out what was going on?
ygData.messageBody:
I've canceled my subcription at least 4 times and never had this problem (currently not subscribed now). Did you call SOE to find out what was going on?

wordless_wolf <wordless_wolf@...> wrote:
I subscribed to Everquest for a while, but had to cancel because I
didn't have enough money to continue.

After I cancelled my subscription, I continued to get charged for 6
months afterwards.

I just thought I should let people know what they're dealing with.




Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
